entities.name: AMY E. HOOD
entities.description: Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Microsoft Corporation as of July 29, 2021.

entities.name: SATYA NADELLA
entities.description: Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of Microsoft Corporation as of July 29, 2021.

entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a Washington-based technology company that filed an annual report on Form 10-K for the year ended June 30, 2021.

entities.name: SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
entities.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is a U.S. government agency responsible for enforcing federal securities laws and regulating the securities industry.

relationships.relationship_description: Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Microsoft Corporation.
Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of Microsoft Corporation.
Microsoft Corporation filed an annual report with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
